attributes.action: Encourage livestock farmers to install wind turbines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allow livestock farmers, especially those who's units are in remote locations, to install wind turbines by offering a government grant to help with the cost of installation.
This, I believe, is a way to help achieve your targets on green energy production, whilst also benefiting our great farming community to recieve and distribute cheap energy. Thus being of benefit to everyone.
